mapper.select: select * from member where mno > 0 order by mno desc
mapper.insert: insert into member (mno,userid, pw, nickname, phone, email, memberType, profile_Img) values(member_mno_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{memberType}, #{profile_Img})
mapper.select: SELECT mem.userid, pw, nickname, regdate, udate FROM member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN authority auth on mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, nickname =#{nickname},phone =#{phone}, email = #{email}, profile_Img =#{profile_Img}, udate = sysdate where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw=#{pw}
